item.title: 美联储鲍曼在更多削减之前，需要对通胀下降有更大的信心
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周一表示，她希望在再次降息之前，能够更加确信今年的通胀率将进一步下降，尤其是考虑到特朗普政府的新贸易政策和其他政策的影响存在不确定性。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said on Monday she wanted increased conviction that inflation will decline further this year before lowering interest rates again, particularly given uncertainty around the impact of the Trump administration's new trade and other policies.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈克支持目前保持稳定的利率政策立场
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）周一对美国经济状况表示乐观，并称在央行继续努力降低通胀水平的同时，他认为目前没有理由改变利率政策。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker sounded an upbeat note on the state of the U.S. economy on Monday, and said he saw no reason to change interest rate policy right now as the central bank continued to work to lower inflation levels.】

item.title: 墨西哥龙舌兰酒制造商因美国关税威胁其业务而焦虑不安
item.description: 在美国征收 25% 进口税的威胁笼罩下，墨西哥龙舌兰酒制造商焦虑不安，因为他们花费数年时间建立起来的企业将面临倒闭的命运。【原文：With the threat of a 25% U.S. import tax hanging over them, Mexican tequila manufacturers are anxious that businesses they've spent years building will have the rug pulled out from under them.】

item.title: 诺瓦克称 "欧佩克+"不考虑推迟四月石油供应上调时间
item.description: 据俄罗斯 RIA 国家通讯社报道，俄罗斯副总理亚历山大-诺瓦克周一表示，欧佩克+产油国不考虑推迟定于 4 月份开始的一系列月度石油供应增加计划。【原文：OPEC+ producers are not considering delaying a series of monthly oil supply increases that is scheduled to begin in April, Russian Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak said on Monday, Russia's RIA state news agency reported.】

item.title: 康奈格拉品牌公司下调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: Conagra Brands 周一进一步下调了年度利润预期，理由是其两个产品平台的供应受到限制。【原文：Conagra Brands trimmed its annual profit forecast further on Monday, citing supply constraints on two of its product platforms.】

item.title: 总部位于迪拜的 Huda Beauty 向联合创始人和 General Atlantic 出售香水系列 KAYALI
item.description: 总部位于迪拜的 Huda Beauty 公司周一发表联合声明称，将向其联合创始人兼 General Atlantic 公司出售旗下广受欢迎的香水品牌 KAYALI，此举将使该美妆公司的所有者能够回购 TSG Consumer Partners 公司自 2017 年以来持有的股份。【原文：Dubai-based Huda Beauty will sell its popular fragrance brand KAYALI to its co-founder and General Atlantic in a move that allows the beauty company's owners to buy back a stake held by TSG Consumer Partners since 2017, according to a joint statement by the three companies on Monday.】

item.title: 乌克兰停火希望为关税阴影下的欧洲市场带来 "顺风
item.description: 市场押注，俄罗斯和乌克兰之间达成停火协议将消除美国贸易紧张局势加剧的影响，并缓解能源价格和欧元的压力，而对国防开支的预期已经使该行业的股票大涨。【原文：A ceasefire deal between Russia and Ukraine would take the sting out of heightened U.S. trade tensions and ease pressure on energy prices and the euro, markets bet, while expectations for defence spending have already sent stocks in the sector surging.】

item.title: 德国央行警告：德国尤其面临美国关税风险
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，美国的贸易关税可能会在未来几年抑制经济增长。【原文：U.S. trade tariffs could curb growth for years to come, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: 安全需求为欧洲财政蒙上新阴影
item.description: 欧洲各国领导人早就知道，该地区老龄化严重、经济停滞不前，已经到了入不敷出的地步。现在的问题是，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第二个白宫任期所造成的混乱是否意味着他们将为此做些什么。【原文：Europe's leaders have long known the region is living beyond the means of its ageing, stagnant economy. The question is whether the ructions created by Donald Trump's second White House term mean they will do something about it.】

item.title: 中国科技股反弹靠的是 "热钱
item.description: 中国在人工智能领域的明显突破以及与科技巨头的和解使香港股市和互联网巨头飙升，但背后的买家却畏首畏尾，经纪人表示，全球投资者在市场剧烈波动时对下大赌注持谨慎态度。【原文：China's apparent breakthrough in AI and rapprochement with tech giants has sent Hong Kong stocks and internet giants soaring, but the buyers behind it are flighty and brokers say global investors are wary of big bets while markets swing wildly.】

item.title: 巴西公司谨慎押注阿根廷在米莱伊领导下实现转机
item.description: 巴西公司正在考察阿根廷的收购目标，同时加强员工和门店，谨慎地押注于哈维尔-米莱伊总统积极的经济改革，这些改革正开始稳定受危机影响的阿根廷经济。【原文：Brazilian companies are scoping out acquisition targets in Argentina, while beefing up staff and stores in a cautious bet on President Javier Milei's aggressive economic reforms that are beginning to stabilize the crisis-stricken economy.】

item.title: 渣打银行、香港电讯和 Animoca 将成立合资公司，开发港元支持的稳定币
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）周一表示，其香港银行部门、Animoca Brands 和 HKT 将成立一家合资企业，向香港金融管理局申请发行港元支持的稳定币的许可证。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc , said on Monday its Hong Kong banking division, Animoca Brands and HKT will establish a joint venture to apply for a license from the Hong Kong Monetary Authority for issuance of a Hong Kong dollar-backed stablecoin.】

item.title: 百度股价下滑，市值缩水 24 亿美元，外界猜测习近平将与百度会面
item.description: 中国搜索引擎巨头百度的创始人没有出席国家主席习近平与企业领导人的罕见会晤，百度港股周一暴跌，市值缩水 24 亿美元。【原文：The Hong Kong shares of Baidu plunged on Monday, wiping $2.4 billion off its market value, after the founder of the Chinese search engine giant was not spotted at a rare meeting between President Xi Jinping and corporate leaders.】

item.title: 西方供应链危机下全球航空航天企业转向印度
item.description: 业内人士称，空中客车公司、柯林斯宇航公司、普惠公司和罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司正在扩大从印度采购零部件的规模，从而推动了印度新兴航空航天业的增长，并促使当地企业提高自身的竞技水平。【原文：Airbus , Collins Aerospace, Pratt & Whitney, and Rolls-Royce are expanding parts sourcing from India, driving growth in the country's emerging aerospace sector and pushing local firms to elevate their games, industry insiders say.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Stellantis 将在特莫利生产混合动力汽车变速箱
item.description: 两位消息人士称，Stellantis 还将在意大利南部的特尔莫利（Termoli）开始生产用于混合动力汽车的双离合器变速箱，此举可为本应转向电动汽车电池生产的工厂提供替代战略。【原文：Stellantis will start making dual-clutch transmissions for hybrid vehicles also in Termoli, Southern Italy, two sources said, in a move that could provide an alternative strategy for a facility that was due to turn to EV battery production.】

item.title: 参加习近平座谈会的中国企业及其创始人
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平周一向十多位中国最大企业的创始人和首席执行官发表讲话，希望借此提振私营部门的情绪。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping addressed more than a dozen founders and chief executives from some of China's largest companies on Monday, in a bid to boost private sector sentiment.】

item.title: 微软将投资 7 亿美元加强波兰的网络安全
item.description: 微软公司总裁周一表示，微软计划在波兰追加投资 7 亿美元，与波兰武装部队合作提高波兰的网络安全，但未作详细说明。【原文：Microsoft plans to invest an additional 700 million dollars in Poland to improve Polish cybersecurity in cooperation with the country's armed forces, the company's president said on Monday without elaborating.】

item.title: 香港评论为使用加密货币作为财富证明敞开大门
item.description: 在一位本地会计师公开谈论了两起接受数字资产的案例后，香港政府首次回应了有关使用加密货币作为移民计划财富证明的问题。【原文：The Hong Kong government has responded for the first time to questions about the use of cryptocurrencies as proof of wealth for an immigration scheme after a local accountant talked publicly about two cases that had accepted the digital assets.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Shein 面临投资者压力，要求将估值降至 300 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，在线快时尚零售商Shein正面临将其估值降至约300亿美元的压力。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein is under pressure to cut its valuation to about $30 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国阿苏拉公司拒绝 KKR 和养老基金提出的 20 亿美元收购建议
item.description: 总部位于美国的私募股权投资集团 KKR 周一表示，英国医疗保健房地产投资信托公司 Assura 已拒绝了 KKR 和养老基金 Universities Superannuation Scheme 提出的 15.6 亿英镑（19.6 亿美元）收购建议。【原文：British healthcare real estate investment trust Assura has rejected a 1.56 billion pound ($1.96 billion) proposal from KKR and pension fund Universities Superannuation Scheme, the U.S.-based private equity group said on Monday.】

item.title: 日本为日本央行更快、更高地提高利率做好准备
item.description: 日本央行的鹰派言论和持续的通胀正将债券收益率推升至多年高点，并推动加息预期升温，打破了人们长期以来的看法，即在这个历来容易出现通货紧缩的经济体中，利率不会大幅上升。【原文：Hawkish comments from the Bank of Japan and sticky inflation are lifting bond yields to multi-year highs and pushing forward rate hike expectations, shaking long-held views that rates would not rise much in the historically deflation-prone economy.】

item.title: 韩国旨在为国家人工智能计算中心确保 10,000 个 GPU
item.description: 韩国周一宣布，计划在今年内获得 10,000 个高性能图形处理器（GPU），以跟上全球人工智能竞赛升级的步伐。【原文：South Korea on Monday announced plans to secure 10,000 high-performance graphics processing units (GPUs) within this year in a bid to keep pace as the global AI race escalates.】

item.title: 石场称美国阻止新日铁与美国钢铁公司交易的决定是 "不公正的政治干预
item.description: 日本首相石破茂周一表示，美国政府审查委员会和时任总统乔-拜登阻止新日铁收购美国钢铁公司的决定是 "不公正的政治干预"。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said on Monday the decision by a United States government review board and then-President Joe Biden to block Nippon Steel's acquisition of U.S. Steel was "unjust political interference."】

item.title: 洞察力：欧洲最大经济体停滞不前，德国选民要求变革
item.description: Lars Baumguertel 希望德国的政治家们拿出支票簿。【原文：Lars Baumguertel wants Germany's politicians to get out their cheque books.】

item.title: 早间竞购嘿，亚洲也有科技股
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 反对党领袖威胁解体后澳大利亚保险股下滑
item.description: 在反对党领袖彼得-达顿（Peter Dutton）威胁要解散这些公司，指责它们剥削客户之后，澳大利亚保险公司周一大幅下跌，因为该国正在为五月份的联邦选举做准备。【原文：Australian insurance companies fell sharply on Monday after opposition leader Peter Dutton threatened to break them up, accusing them of exploiting customers, as the country prepares for federal elections due by May.】

item.title: 习近平会见民营企业有何意义？
item.description: 据官方媒体周一报道，中国国家主席习近平在民营企业座谈会上发表了讲话，阿里巴巴联合创始人马云等科技企业家出席了座谈会。【原文：China's President Xi Jinping has delivered a speech at a symposium on private enterprises attended by tech entrepreneurs including Alibaba co-founder Jack Ma, official media reported on Monday.】

item.title: 据《Tempo》杂志报道，部分印尼议员希望解除央行行长职务
item.description: 调查杂志《Tempo》周一援引不愿透露姓名的消息来源报道称，印尼国会的一些议员计划建议总统解除央行行长的职务，因为他们认为他没有适当地支持政府的政策。【原文：Some members of Indonesia's parliament plan to propose the president remove the central bank governor because they think he was not properly backing the government's policy, investigative magazine Tempo reported on Monday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 橡树提供再融资，星空获得潜在生命线；股价反弹
item.description: Star Entertainment 周一宣布，总部位于美国的 Oaktree 公司（OAKCP.UL）提出为其 6.5 亿澳元（4.134 亿美元）的债务进行再融资，这对资金短缺的该公司来说可能是一条重要的救命稻草。【原文：Star Entertainment announced on Monday that U.S.-based Oaktree (OAKCP.UL) had offered to refinance A$650 million ($413.40 million) of its debt in what could be a major lifeline for the cash-strapped firm.】

item.title: 习近平出席民营企业座谈会并发表讲话
item.description: 官方通讯社新华社周一称，中国国家主席习近平出席民营企业座谈会，并在听取民营企业代表发言后发表讲话。【原文：China's President Xi Jinping has attended a symposium on private enterprises and delivered a speech after listening to representatives of private companies, official news agency Xinhua said on Monday.】
